page.title: 13"A Metheringham Custom"
page.content: The feast is the last full week of October and is associated with Saint Wilfred feast on the 13th of October. Saint Wilfred harvest festival is always that weekend.The special dish is stuffed chine (bacon stuffed with parsley).The fair is held in the Star and Garter paddock and open Friday, Saturday,Monday and Tuesday.Many people visit from neighbouring villages.Rides include; Paratrooper 30p Dodgems 50p Swing 20p Waltzer 20p Merry_go_round 20p side shows include; Darts 20p Win_a_fish 30p Hook_a_duck 25p Hoopla 20p Rifle Range 20p Five Shots Coconut shy 20p Five Balls And Food Stalls.There is a man sells crockery on Saturday and Tuesday.
